description:
ISO Tolerances is an engineering application  for designers, engineers, quality control, machinist and people who likes mechanics.
All tolerances and deviations that normally you need to consult at charts and engineering books now have them all in your webOS device.
A graphical representation of the allowed deviation helps you to understand the type of fit selected and how it affects between hole and shaft assembly.
Clearances and absolute limit values are also calculated and displayed.
ISO Tolerances helps you to choose a correct fit, telling you the type of assembly for the  recommended fits by the standards. 
All the tolerances and deviations  are according to ISO 286.
versionNote:
Fixed an issue affecting  graphics for "m" tolerance in shafts.

Fixed a problem affecting letters "m" and "n" in the list of shaft tolerances.

Increased length of the size input field.
